name: Crypto Planet - Crypto Trading Exchange UI Template In Figma
description:
Crypto Planet is a Crypto trading exchange UI template to sell, purchase, and hold cryptocurrencies. This template is designed with a lot of research and after creating a well researched UX. This enabled us to create the full Crypto trading exchange process.

Crypto Planet offers a very unique, interactive and modern UI along with a well researched UX. The template has been designed in Figma which makes it easy to customize.

  • Template comes with both dark and light interfaces
  • It comes with 33 different pages that covers the whole trading exchange process
  • The template also consists 33 mobile UI interfaces
  • It offers 3 different crypto listing pages
  • All the elements are converted into Figma components which makes it very easy to customize
  • Retina Ready
  • Well Documented
  • Creative Layouts
  • Easy to understand layer structure
  • Designed with Bootstrap grid system
  • Free Google Fonts used
  • Easily Customizable
  • Blog page Designs
  • Pixel Perfect Design
  • Based on Extensive UX Research
  • Fonts: Inter â€“ Google Fonts
  • Icons: Flaticon
  • Images: Freepik
